stx.reactive.Signals

type
class

Static Methods

cond<T>(conditions : Iterable<stx.Tuple2<Signal<Bool>, Signal<T>>>, elseS : Signal<T>) : Signal<T>

parameters
conditions An Iterable of Tuple2s, composed of a true/false Signals and an 'if true' Signal that will be returned if Tuple._1 == 'true.'
elseS The Signal to return if Tuple._1 == false.
returns
An 'ifTrue' Signal if Tuple._1 == true, else an 'ifFalse' Signal.
Switches off a supplied Bool Signal, returning an 'ifTrue' Signal if true or a 'ifFalse' Signal if false.

constant<T>(value : T) : Signal<T>

sample(time : Int) : Signal<Int>

parameters
time The interval at which to sample time.
Returns the time at a specified time step interval.

sampleS(time : Signal<Int>) : Signal<Int>

parameters
time The interval at which to sample time.

zipN<T>(signals : Iterable<Signal<T>>) : Signal<Iterable<T>>

parameters
signals An Iterable of the Signals to be zipped.
Zips together the specified Signals.

new()
